2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **dry vermouth**, and 30ml of **Aperol**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Copenhagen 1939
cocktails.description: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, **red vermouth**, **cherry liqueur** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 30ml of **cherry liqueur**, a dash of **orange bitters**, a dash of **lemon**, and a dash of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.

cocktails.name: Cornwall Negroni
cocktails.description: A **gin**-forward variation of the classic Negroni, preserving its bittersweet vermouth-and-bitter structure with an extra lift from **orange bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15ml of **strucchi bitter**, 15ml of **red vermouth**, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Corona Sunrise
cocktails.description: A vibrant and refreshing **beer** cocktail that puts a tropical twist on the classic **Tequila Sunrise**. It perfectly blends the crispness of **Corona** with **Tequila blanco**, sweet **orange juice**, and a splash of **grenadine** for a beautiful layered look.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pub glass with **ice**.
2. Add 330ml of **Corona**, 45ml of **Tequila blanco**, 45ml of **orange juice**, and 15ml of **grenadine** to a pub glass.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward **brandy** drink built around **Cognac**, **calvados**, **red vermouth**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **calvados**, and 30ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **orange**.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.description: A balanced mix of **gin**, citrus, and aromatics traditionally taken as a morning pick-me-up.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add a dash of **absinthe**, 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Cointreau**, 30ml of **Lillet Blanc**, and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A citrusy **vodka** cocktail with cranberry and **orange** notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **vodka citron**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 30ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Creamsicle
cocktails.description: A luscious and velvety cocktail that perfectly captures the nostalgic flavor of an **orange** creamsicle. It balances the bright, citrusy notes of **vodka** and grand mariner with the rich, smooth texture of fresh **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Pour 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **Grand Marnier**, 30ml of **heavy cream**, and 7.5ml of **rich simple syrup** (if desired) into the cocktail shaker.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a fresh **orange** slice or zest.

cocktails.name: Creme Anglaise
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy **vodka** drink featuring **vodka**, **egg liqueur**, **cream**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 60ml of **egg liqueur**, and 15ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick and nora glass.
5. Garnish with 2 pinches of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Crimson King
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward **whiskey** cocktail that balances the spicy bite of rye with the complex bitterness of strucchi and the herbal depth of **Punt e Mes**. Hints of **cherry** and coffee add a mysterious, dark richness to this bold drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 22.5ml of **strucchi bitter**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 7.5ml of **Cherry Heering**, and 5ml of **Crème de Café**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.description: A simple mix of rum, **cola**, and **lime** for a refreshing long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **white rum**, 10ml of **lime juice**, and 120ml of **cola**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Culto A La Vida
cocktails.description: A bright rum sour balancing **dark rum**, **sugar**, **lime** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **dark rum**, a teaspoon of **sugar**, 120ml of **cranberry juice**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A classic rum sour balancing **lime** and **sugar**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 20ml of **lime juice**, and 20ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Damn the Bloody Weather
cocktails.description: A tropical **gin** cocktail with **gin**, **orange curaçao**, **red vermouth**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with **blood orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **orange curaçao**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 45ml of **blood orange** juice, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **blood orange**.

cocktails.name: Dan Sabo's Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy **whiskey** drink featuring rye whisky, **lemon**, **egg white**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **maraschino cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **orange juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters** and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Dandy
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward **whiskey** drink built around whisky, **dubonnet**, **Cointreau**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **whiskey**, 45ml of **dubonnet**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, and a dash of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n Stormy
cocktails.description: Spicy **ginger beer** topped with **dark rum** for a stormy refresher.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Goslings rum** and 100ml of **ginger beer**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Death & Taxes
cocktails.description: A complex **whiskey** cocktail where **Scotch whisky**, **gin**, **Punt e Mes** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Scotch whisky**, 30ml of **gin**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, 7.5ml of **Benedictine**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Death In The Afternoon
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward wine cocktail showcasing **absinthe**, **sparkling wine**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 30ml of **absinthe**, 10ml of **simple syrup**, and 100ml of **sparkling wine** to a flute glass.
2. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
3. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Delta Sunset
cocktails.description: Delta sunset is a glorious, quite strong cocktail. Best served with farinaceous starchy dishes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cointreau**, 30ml of **orange liqueur**, and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: Derby Popular
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward **whiskey** drink built around **bourbon**, **Benedictine**, **Angostura bitters**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 10ml of **Benedictine**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Desert Island
cocktails.description: A long, sparkling liqueur drink built for easy sipping, pairing **coconut liqueur**, **cola** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Garnished with **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **coconut liqueur** and 150ml of **cola**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** slice and a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Devil's Margarita
cocktails.description: A bright agave spirit sour balancing **Tequila blanco**, **red wine** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **tequila blanco**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 20ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine-strain into a chilled glass.
5. Carefully float 15ml of **red wine** on top.
6. Garnish with a **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Dirty Banana
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring **aged rum**, **coffee liqueur**, **banana liqueur**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **banana**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 60ml of **aged rum**, 30ml of **coffee liqueur**, 30ml of **banana liqueur**, 60ml of **cream**, 1 peeled **banana**, and about 150g of crushed **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Pour into a chilled glass.
4. Optionally drizzle 5ml of **chocolate syrup** inside the glass.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice on the rim.

cocktails.name: Dirty Girl Scout
cocktails.description: A sweet and moderate cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **coffee liqueur**, 45ml of **Baileys**, and 45ml of **Crème de Menthe white**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooters glasses.
5. Garnish every glass with a pinch of grated **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Dirty Martini
cocktails.description: An IBA official variation of the martini drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 10ml of **dry vermouth**, and 10ml of **olive brine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with 3 olives.

cocktails.name: Dirty Shirley
cocktails.description: A long, sparkling **vodka** drink built for easy sipping, pairing **vodka**, **grenadine**, **lime** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Garnished with **maraschino cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **grenadine**, and 120ml of **lemon-lime soda**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Don's Special Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A tiki-style daiquiri with **grapefruit** and **honey** notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gold Jamaican rum**, 15ml of **Cuban rum**, 15ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **honey syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled tiki glass.
5. Garnish with a half of **passion fruit**.

cocktails.name: Doralto
cocktails.description: A long, sparkling agave spirit drink built for easy sipping, pairing **Tequila blanco**, **Angostura bitters**, **tonic** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Garnished with **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, and a dash of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 100ml of **tonic**.
6. Garnish with a **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Dry Martini
cocktails.description: A timeless mix of **gin** and **dry vermouth** served icy cold.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 10ml of **dry vermouth**, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with an **olive**, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Dubonnet Cocktail
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward classic cocktail that perfectly balances the herbal complexity of **gin** with the rich, wine-based aromatics of **dubonnet** rouge. Historically known as a favorite of the British royal family, it offers a deep, velvet texture and a refined botanical finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin** and 60ml of **dubonnet**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Eastern Promise
cocktails.description: An elegant and aromatic **vodka**-based sour that marries the floral notes of rose with the lush sweetness of apricot. This cocktail offers a sophisticated balance of tart citrus and botanical depth, making for a crisp and refreshing drink with a delicate floral finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 7.5ml of **apricot brandy**, 15ml of **rose syrup**, and 15ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Eastside
cocktails.description: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, **mint**, **cucumber** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the **cucumber** slices and **simple syrup** in a cocktail shaker. Muddle thoroughly to extract the juice.
2. Drop in the **mint** leaves and muddle gently.
3. Add the **gin** and **lime juice**. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.
6. Garnish with a thin **cucumber** wheel on the surface or a fresh **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: El Diablo
cocktails.description: A classic highball that perfectly balances the earthy notes of **Tequila** with the tart sweetness of blackcurrant liqueur and the spicy kick of **ginger beer**. It is a refreshing, vibrant, and slightly mysterious drink with a beautiful deep hue.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **Crème de Cassis**, and 22.5ml of fresh **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 60ml of **ginger beer** and stir gently.
6. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: El Presidente
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and sleek Cuban classic that balances the crispness of **white rum** with the herbal notes of **dry vermouth** and the bright citrus of **orange curaçao**. Often called the 'aristocrat of cocktails,' it offers a smooth, ruby-tinted elegance perfect for slow sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **dry vermouth**, 15ml of **orange curaçao**, and 10ml of **grenadine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Electric Lemonade
cocktails.description: There are a few variations and substitutions you can play around with. You could replace **lemon-lime soda** with club soda or **tonic** **water** for a less sweet version. You can also opt for a party punch recipe by scaling the ingredients in this electric **lemonade** recipe.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add **vodka**, blue curacao, **lemon juice**, and **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fill a high ball or collins glass, then strain in the cocktail.
5. Top it off with **lemon-lime soda**.
6. Stir gently to combine.
7. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Emerald Banana
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail that balances the smooth warmth of **Irish whiskey** with the exotic, tropical notes of green **banana liqueur**. **Amaro Montenegro** adds a complex botanical depth, resulting in a spirit-forward drink that is both aromatic and slightly bitter. Perfect for those who enjoy a modern twist on classic **whiskey** serves.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Irish whiskey**, 20ml of **Pisang Ambon**, and 20ml of **Amaro Montenegro**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Emerson
cocktails.description: A bright **gin** sour balancing **Old Tom gin**, **red vermouth**, maraschino liqueur with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Old Tom gin**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 10ml of **Luxardo maraschino**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: End of the Road
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward liqueur drink built around **Laphroaig**, **Campari**, **green Chartreuse**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Laphroaig**, 30ml of **Campari**, and 30ml of **green Chartreuse**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: English Channel
cocktails.description: English channel is a refined, slow-sipping cocktail that combines herbal liqueurs with the British staple of **earl grey tea**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5ml of **Grand Marnier**, 22.5ml of **Benedictine**, and 60ml of **earl grey tea**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Eskimo Slugger
cocktails.description: A potent and refreshing dessert cocktail that strikes a perfect balance between the creamy sweetness of **Irish cream**, the purity of **vodka**, and the intense peppermint chill of **Rumple Minze**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add **Irish cream**, **vodka**, and **peppermint liqueur**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a martini glass.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: A smooth **vodka** martini energized with **espresso** and **coffee liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **Kahlua**, 30ml of **espresso**, and 10ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans**.

cocktails.name: Fergroni
synonyms: Negroni with Punt e Mes and Strucchi Bitter
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward twist on the classic Negroni. This cocktail elegantly balances the botanical notes of **gin** with the dark, bittersweet complexity of **Punt e Mes** and the herbal depth of **strucchi bitter**, resulting in a rich and aromatic sipping experience.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Punt e Mes**, 20ml of **strucchi bitter**, and a **lemon** peel.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Fernandito
cocktails.description: Argentina's favorite mix of fernet and **cola** over **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Fernet Branca** and 120ml of **cola**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Final Ward
cocktails.description: Perhaps the most famous variation of the classic "Last Word" cocktail created by Phil Ward, with **rye whiskey** instead of **gin** and **lemon juice** instead of **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 20ml of rye whisky, 20ml of **green Chartreuse**, 20ml of maraschino liqueur and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Fireball
cocktails.description: A fiery party shooter that blends **white rum**, **Goldschläger**, and a dash of **Tabasco** for a spicy-sweet kick.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Pour 75ml of **white rum**, 75ml of **Goldschläger**, and 3 dashes of **Tabasco**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: First Word
cocktails.description: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, maraschino liqueur, **dry vermouth** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **gin**, 25ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 25ml of **dry vermouth**, 15ml of **Aperol**, and 25ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry** and a peel of **orange**.

cocktails.name: Flaming Dr Pepper
cocktails.description: Although dr pepper is not one of ingredients of this cocktail, it is claimed that it tastes like dr pepper.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pint glass halfway with **beer**.
2. Add the **amaretto** to a shot glass and top with the rum.
3. Set the rum on fire and very carefully drop the shot glass into the **beer**.

cocktails.name: Flaming Volcano
cocktails.description:
Flaming volcano is a large tropical group cocktail typically made with rum, **brandy**, **pineapple juice**, **orange juice**, and orgeat syrup.
A flaming volcano is usually served to a group of two or more people with a set of very long straws to facilitate convenient group sipping from a comfortable distance and for safety.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Get some crushed **ice** into a bowl.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **brandy** and 30ml of **dark rum**.
3. Add 60ml of **orange juice**, 60ml of **pineapple juice**, 30ml of **lemon juice** and 60ml of almond syrup.
4. Blend well and pour into a volcano bowl.

cocktails.name: Flatliner
cocktails.description: A strong and really invigorating shot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **sambuca** into a shooter.
2. Carefully pour 25ml of **Tequila blanco** on top of the **sambuca**.
3. Add a dash of **Tabasco**.

cocktails.name: Flip #27
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and velvety dessert cocktail that masterfully blends the richness of **port** with the deep notes of **aged rum**. The addition of **raspberry syrup** and **heavy cream** creates a luxurious, smooth texture, while the whole **egg** provides the classic frothy 'flip' finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine **port**, **aged rum**, **raspberry syrup**, **heavy cream**, and the **egg** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture into a chilled goblet glass to ensure a smooth texture.
6. Garnish with fresh raspberries on top.

cocktails.name: Fluffy Duck Classic
cocktails.description: Light, creamy and easy drinking. **Gin** prevents this particular duck from being too fluffy.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Advocaat**, 20ml of **orange liqueur**, and 20ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a tall glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 30ml of chilled **soda water** and stir gently.
6. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Fluffy Duck Modern
cocktails.description: A stronger version of the cocktail. If you want something smoother, check out the 'fluffy duck 2'.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **Advocaat**, 30ml of **triple sec**, and 30ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into an **ice**-filled glass.
5. Top with 30ml of cold **lemonade**.
6. Garnish with a **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Fort Point
synonyms: Rye Manhattan with Punt e Mes and Benedictine
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward riff on the Manhattan. This cocktail combines the spicy bite of rye whisky with the bitter-sweet complexity of **Punt e Mes** and the herbal **honey** notes of **Benedictine**. It is a deep, aromatic, and perfectly balanced drink meant to be savored slowly.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 7.5ml of **Benedictine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: Crisp **gin** and **lemon** topped with sparkling **Champagne**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled flute glass.
5. Top with 60ml of **Champagne**.
6. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: French Connection
cocktails.description: Equal-parts blend of **Cognac** and **amaretto** served over **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac** and 45ml of **amaretto**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: French Dew Sour
cocktails.description: An elegant and sophisticated twist on the classic sour, the French dew sour combines the deep, oaky notes of **Cognac** with the herbal complexity of **Benedictine**. Infused with fresh **rosemary** and a hint of **black pepper**, this cocktail offers a creamy texture thanks to the **egg white**, balanced by a bright citrus finish and a touch of warm **vanilla**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Lightly muddle the fresh **rosemary** and **black pepper** in the bottom of a cocktail shaker.
2. Add the **Cognac**, **Benedictine**, **lemon juice**, **rich simple syrup**, **egg white**, **Angostura bitters**, and **vanilla extract** to the shaker.
3. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
4. Add plenty of **ice** to the shaker.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
7. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and an extra crack of **black pepper** if desired.

cocktails.name: French Martini
cocktails.description: **Vodka** shaken with **raspberry liqueur** and **pineapple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **raspberry liqueur**, and 15ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel and a **raspberry**.

cocktails.name: French Pearl
cocktails.description: Created by Audrey Saunders, this modern classic is a sophisticated **gin** sour that bridges the gap between a southside and a **pastis**-heavy aperitif. The **anise** notes from the **pastis** beautifully complement the fresh **mint** and botanical **gin**, resulting in a complex, refreshing, and herbal cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Gently muddle the fresh **mint** leaves with the **rich simple syrup** in a cocktail shaker to release the essential oils.
2. Add the **gin**, **pastis**, and fresh **lime juice** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled coupe glass to remove **mint** fragments.
6. Garnish with a **lime** wheel and a fresh **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Fresh Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A vibrant and sophisticated twist on the classic daiquiri. This cocktail combines the lush sweetness of muddled strawberries with crisp **white rum** and zesty **lime**, enhanced by a subtle pinch of **black pepper** and **salt** to elevate the fruity notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place 7 fresh strawberries into a shaker and muddle thoroughly to release their juices.
2. Add the **white rum**, fresh **lime juice**, **rich simple syrup**, **black pepper**, and **salt** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled coupe glass to remove **strawberry** seeds and pulp.
6. Garnish with a fresh **strawberry** on the rim.

cocktails.name: Frost Bite
cocktails.description: This cocktail features a striking blue color from **blue curaçao** layered with creamy sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **blue curaçao**, 15ml of **crème de cacao white**, and 15ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with 2 **maraschino cherries**.

cocktails.name: Frozen Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A variation of the popular daiquiri cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 60ml of **aged rum**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, 22.5ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 7.5ml of **Luxardo maraschino** to a blender and blend briefly without **ice** on a slow setting.
2. Add about 150 g of crushed **ice** and blend again until smooth.
3. Pour into a chilled glass.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge on the rim, skewered with a **maraschino cherry**.
5. Serve with a straw.

cocktails.name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A frozen-style cocktail for sharing, blending fresh strawberries, citrus, and light rum into a balanced, fruit-forward drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the frozen strawberries and **sugar** into a high-speed blender.
2. Pour in the **white rum**, **lemon juice**, and **lime juice**.
3. Add the **ice** to the blender container.
4. Blend on high speed until the mixture reaches a smooth, slushy consistency.
5. Pour the punch into chilled glasses.
6. Garnish each glass with a fresh **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Fuzzy Navel
synonyms: Peach Schnapps and Orange Juice Cocktail
cocktails.description: The fuzzy navel is a classic 1980s cocktail that combines the fruity sweetness of **peach** with the citrus tang of **orange**. It is one of the simplest cocktails to make, typically requiring only two main ingredients.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **peach schnapps** and 90ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge and a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Galliano Hotshot
cocktails.description: A layered shot with **Galliano**, coffee and **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **Galliano** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully add 20ml of **espresso** and 10ml of **cream** on top of the **Galliano**.

cocktails.name: Garibaldi
cocktails.description: Italian mix of bitter **Campari** and fresh **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Campari** and 120ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gem
cocktails.description: A sophisticated tropical delight that balances the depth of **aged rum** and **Cognac** with the bright acidity of **lime** and the lush sweetness of **pineapple**. This cocktail offers a complex, velvety texture with a refreshing finish, perfect for an upscale beach vibe.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **aged rum**, 30ml of **Cognac**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, 10ml of **pineapple syrup**, 5ml of **rich simple syrup**, and a dash of **bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Genever Fruit Cup
cocktails.description: A refreshing and bubbly long drink that showcases the malty notes of **oude genever** paired with citrusy curaçao and herbal **red vermouth**. Topped with **ginger ale** and **cola**, it's a botanical, fruit-forward sparkler perfect for social sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 25ml of **oude genever**, 15ml of **orange curaçao**, 25ml of **red vermouth**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, 50ml of **ginger ale**, and 50ml of **cola** to a Collins glass.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice, a **lemon** slice, 4 **strawberry** slices, a **mint** sprig, and a **borage** sprig.

cocktails.name: Gibson
cocktails.description: A strong **gin** martini garnished with a silverskin onion.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin** and 30ml of **dry vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with 3 silver onions.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.description: A classic **gin**-based cocktail with a long history.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin & Sin
cocktails.description: This cocktail's name speaks for itself. Bright, strong and good for adventure. It may be prepared as a shot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 30ml of **orange juice** and a dash of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Gin & Tonic
cocktails.description: A timeless and refreshing highball cocktail that perfectly balances the botanical notes of **gin** with the crisp bitterness of **tonic** **water**. This effervescent drink is elevated by a bright citrus aroma, making it a sophisticated yet simple choice for any occasion.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin** and 120ml of **tonic** to a highball glass.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin Basil Smash
cocktails.description: Herbal **gin** sour brightened with fresh **basil**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **basil** and **rich simple syrup** in a shaker.
2. Add **gin**, **lemon juice**, and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a **basil** leaf.

cocktails.name: Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: Classic **gin** sour lengthened with **soda water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
6. Top with 60ml of soda.
7. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Gin Rickey
cocktails.description: This classic cocktail is considered the best of the 'rickey' group of drinks, which are made from a base spirit, **lime juice** and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 100ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin Sour
cocktails.description: The **gin** sour is a classic 'sour' cocktail. It can be served in a cocktail glass or a rocks glass.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **sugar** syrup and an optional **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with either a **lemon** slice and **maraschino cherry** or with several drops of **Angostura bitters**.

cocktails.name: Gladiator
cocktails.description: The gladiator cocktail is a drop shot like the Irish slammer. You pour the liqueurs into a shot glass, drop that glass into a larger glass filled with the mixers and "shoot" the entire drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 15ml of **amaretto**, 15ml of **peach schnapps**, 60ml of **7-Up**, and 60ml of **orange juice** to a pub glass.
2. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Godfather
cocktails.description: A good mix of **Scotch whisky** and **amaretto**, this rich-flavoured cocktail is an IBA official cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Scotch whisky**, 20ml of **amaretto**, and 2 dashes of **bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** peel.

cocktails.name: Godmother
cocktails.description: This IBA official cocktail is a softer variation of another classic cocktail – godfather.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 20ml of **amaretto**, and 2 dashes of **bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** peel.

cocktails.name: Gold Rush
cocktails.description: A variation of the "**whiskey** sour" with **honey** instead of **sugar** syrup.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 20ml of **lemon juice** and 20ml of **honey syrup**(3:1).
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge, or express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Golden Cadillac
synonyms: Galliano and Crème de Cacao Cocktail
cocktails.description: The golden cadillac is a sweet, creamy, retro dessert cocktail. Created in 1952 at poor red's in el dorado, california, it became popular in the 1960s for its rich, **vanilla**-forward flavor, similar to a **brandy** alexander but with **Galliano**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 20ml of **Galliano**, 20ml of crème de cacao white and 20ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with grated **chocolate** and **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Golden Dream
cocktails.description: An IBA official cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 20ml of **Galliano**, 20ml of **triple sec**, 20ml of **orange juice**, and 10ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Grand Margarita
cocktails.description: Premium take on the classic margarita with **Tequila blanco** and **Grand Marnier**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Rim a margarita glass with **salt**.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add **Tequila blanco**, **Grand Marnier**, **lime juice**, and **agave syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into the prepared glass.
6. Garnish with a **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Grasshopper
synonyms: Crème de Menthe and Crème de Cacao Cocktail
cocktails.description: Creamy after-dinner mix of **mint** and **chocolate** liqueurs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 20ml of **Crème de Cacao white**, 20ml of **Crème de Menthe Green**, and 20ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Greek Tragedy
synonyms: Ouzo, Red Vermouth and Raspberry Cocktail
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and vibrant wine-based sour that masterfully balances the herbal notes of **Ouzo** with the botanical depth of **red vermouth**. The addition of **raspberry liqueur** provides a lush fruity undertone, while fresh **lime juice** ensures a crisp, refreshing finish. Elegant and complex, it is a perfect modern twist on mediterranean flavors.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Ouzo**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 30ml of **raspberry liqueur**, and 20ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry** and a **lime** twist.

cocktails.name: Green Mexican
cocktails.description: The "green Mexican" is a vibrant, sweet-and-sour layered shot. It features a distinct three-tier appearance when prepared correctly.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Bottom layer: pour the green **banana liqueur** into a shot glass first.
2. Middle layer: carefully pour the **lemon juice** over the back of a bar spoon to layer it on top of the liqueur.
3. Top layer: gently layer the **Tequila blanco** as the final top tier using the same bar spoon method.

cocktails.name: Green Tea
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and aromatic **vodka** cocktail that blends the herbal notes of bison grass **vodka** with the tropical sweetness of **Pisang Ambon** and a subtle cooling hint of white **mint**. Despite its name, it contains no tea, but offers a complex, spirit-forward profile complemented by crisp **apple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of bison grass **vodka**, 7.5ml of **Pisang Ambon**, 5ml of **Crème de Menthe white**, and 45ml of **apple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice.

cocktails.name: Green Vesper
cocktails.description: A popular variation of the "Vesper" cocktail invented by james bond in "casino royale". The original recipe has **Kina Lillet** instead of **absinthe**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 20ml of **vodka**, and 10ml of **absinthe**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Greyhound
cocktails.description: The greyhound is a softer variation of the "salty dog" without **salt**. As with the salty dog, **gin** is often substituted with **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **gin** and 200ml of **grapefruit juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **grapefruit** wedge.

cocktails.name: H.S.L. Special
cocktails.description: A bright liqueur-based sour that masterfully balances the herbal complexity of **Amaro Montenegro** with the deep berry notes of **Crème de Mure**. The addition of fresh **lime** and a hint of **absinthe** creates a refreshing, multi-layered profile with a crisp finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add **Amaro Montenegro**, **Crème de Mure**, **lime juice**, **rich simple syrup**, and a dash of **absinthe**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a fresh **blackberry** or a **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Hairy Navel
cocktails.description: This is a stronger variation of the "fuzzy navel" cocktail with **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **peach schnapps**, 30ml of **vodka**, and 120ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Hanky Panky
synonyms: Gin, Red Vermouth and Fernet Branca Cocktail
cocktails.description: Classic **gin** and vermouth cocktail with a hint of fernet.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 45ml of **red vermouth**, and 7.5ml of **Fernet Branca**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Harvard
synonyms: Brandy, Red Vermouth and Angelica Root Cocktail
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on the classic Manhattan, swapping **whiskey** for **brandy**. This spirit-forward drink offers a rich, velvety texture with a complex botanical finish from the **angelica root**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **brandy**, 15ml of **red vermouth**, 2 pinches of **angelica root**, and 5ml of **gomme syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Harvest Negroni
cocktails.description: An autumnal riff on the classic Negroni, replacing **gin** with **calvados** while keeping the bittersweet aperitif balance.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **calvados**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, 22.5ml of **Cynar**, 15ml of **Strucchi Bitter** (or **Campari**), and a dash of **Creole Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a fresh **apple** slice.

cocktails.name: Harvey Wallbanger
cocktails.description: This IBA official cocktail was invented in 1952 by famous three-time world champion mixologist donato "duke" antone.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 90ml of **orange juice**, and 15ml of **Galliano**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Hazelnut Alexander
cocktails.description: A nutty twist on the classic **brandy** alexander. This cocktail blends the deep notes of **Cognac** with rich **chocolate** and toasted hazelnut, rounded out by silky **cream** for a luxurious, dessert-like finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 15ml of **Crème de Cacao**, 22.5ml of **hazelnut liqueur**, and 22.5ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe.
5. Add 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters** on top.
6. Garnish by grating **chocolate** over the surface.

cocktails.name: Hazelnut Martini
cocktails.description: An interesting martini variation with **Frangelico** (**hazelnut liqueur**) and cacao liqueur. If you like it mild, some recipes also suggest adding about a half shot of **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare your martini glasses before shaking up your Martinis by gently drizzling **chocolate syrup** into a martini glass.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **Frangelico** and 15ml of **white crème de cacao**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Hemingway Special
cocktails.description: A tart rum sour with **grapefruit** and maraschino liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 40ml of **grapefruit juice**, 15ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Highball
cocktails.description: A classic whisky highball is one of the oldest **Scotch**-based cocktails, made of just three winning elements: **Scotch whisky**, soda, and **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Scotch whisky** and 120ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Hiroshima
synonyms: Sambuca, Baileys and Absinthe Layered Shooter
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy spirit drink featuring **sambuca**, **Baileys**, **absinthe**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **sambuca** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of **Baileys** and 15ml of **absinthe**.
3. Add several **grenadine** drops using a straw.

cocktails.name: Honey Badger
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and herbal twist on the classic **whiskey** sour. This cocktail marries the bold warmth of **bourbon** with the complex botanical notes of **yellow Chartreuse**, sharpened by a kick of **ginger** and softened by floral **honey**. A sprig of **rosemary** adds an aromatic depth that makes every sip crisp and refreshing.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Lightly muddle the fresh **rosemary** sprig in the bottom of a cocktail shaker to release its essential oils.
2. Add the **bourbon**, **yellow Chartreuse**, **ginger syrup**, **honey syrup**, **lemon juice**, and **lemon bitters** into the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Horny Bull
cocktails.description: Similar to the screwdriver but with **Tequila** instead of **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco** and 100ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktails.name: Horse's Neck
cocktails.description: **Cognac** highball sharpened with **ginger ale** and **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 120ml of **ginger ale**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

cocktails.name: Hot Buttered Rum
cocktails.description: A traditional hot winter drink. Some recipes suggest using warm cider instead of **water**. The **sugar** in the recipe can be substituted with **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 2 teaspoons of **butter**, a teaspoon of **sugar**, a dash of **cinnamon**, a dash of **nutmeg**, 50ml of **dark rum**, and 100ml of **water** to a Toddy glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **cinnamon** stick.

cocktails.name: Hot Toddy
cocktails.description: A warming mix of **whiskey**, **honey**, **lemon** and hot **water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add a teaspoon of **honey**, 45ml of **whiskey**, a quarter of a **lemon**, and 100ml of **boiling water** to a Toddy glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** peel and 2 **cloves**.

cocktails.name: Hurricane
cocktails.description: The hurricane is an iconic tropical cocktail that is brilliantly refreshing on a hot summer day. It is a fun rum-filled drink that includes a captivating combination of **passion fruit** and **orange** juices.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 60ml of **dark rum**, 60g of **passion fruit** puree, 30ml of **orange juice**, 15ml of **grenadine**, and 15ml of **Passoa**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: IBA Tiki
cocktails.description: Fruity tiki blend of rums, juices, and exotic syrups.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **dark rum**, 15ml of **amaretto**, 5ml of **Frangelico**, 5ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 15ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 90ml of **pineapple juice**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and a slice of **ginger**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled tiki glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple** and a **mint**.

cocktails.name: Illegal
cocktails.description: Smoky **mezcal** balanced with herbal Chartreuse and **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of **mezcal**, 15ml of **overproof rum**, 15ml of **falernum**, a bar spoon of **Luxardo maraschino**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup** and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: Improved Scotch Sling
cocktails.description: Scotch-based take on the improved whisky cocktail with **honey** and maraschino.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Islay Scotch whisky**, 22.5ml of **red vermouth**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, a teaspoon of **honey syrup**, a teaspoon of **water**, a teaspoon of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Incredible Hulk
cocktails.description: A vibrant green mix of **Cognac** and **Hpnotiq** named after the comic book hero.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Cognac** and 50ml of **Hpnotiq**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Indian Paintbrush
cocktails.description: A **gin**-based cocktail that beautifully marries the botanical notes of **gin** with the earthy aroma of **rosemary** and the tart brightness of **grapefruit**. This drink offers a perfect balance of herbal sweetness and citrus punch, making it a refreshing choice for any occasion.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **rosemary syrup**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, and 30ml of **grapefruit juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled glass.
5. Garnish with a sprig of **rosemary** or a **grapefruit** twist.

cocktails.name: Irish Alexander
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy dessert cocktail that offers a sophisticated twist on the classic **brandy** alexander. By combining smooth **Cognac** with velvety **Irish cream** and fresh **cream**, it creates a luxurious, silk-like texture with deep notes of cocoa and **vanilla**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Irish cream**, 45ml of **Cognac**, and 15ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Dust the top lightly with **cocoa powder**.

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.description: Warm blend of **Irish whiskey**, hot coffee, and **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Put 2 tablesoons of **brown sugar** to a heatproof glass.
2. Pour in hot 120ml of **espresso**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Add 60ml of **Irish whisky**.
5. Stir gently to combine.
6. Float lightly 50ml of **whipped cream** on top.

cocktails.name: Irish Flag
cocktails.description: Layered shot showing the green, white and **orange** of the Irish flag.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of green crème de menthe into a shooter.
2. Carefully layer 15ml of **Baileys** and 15ml of **Grand Marnier** on top.

cocktails.name: Irish Frog
cocktails.description: Simple layered shot with **melon liqueur** and **Irish cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 25ml of Midori into a shooter.
2. Carefully add 25ml of **Baileys** on top of the Midori.

cocktails.name: Irish Pie Toddy
cocktails.description: A delightful twist on the **whiskey** sour that evokes the flavors of a homemade **apple** pie. The warmth of **Irish whiskey** pairs perfectly with sweet **vanilla** and crisp **apple juice**, balanced by a sharp citrus finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the **whiskey**, **apple juice**, **vanilla syrup**, and **lemon juice** into a small saucepan.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Pour into a warm glass.
4. Squeeze the **orange** zest over the top of the glass to release oils, then drop the peel in.
5. Add the **cinnamon** stick and **apple** slice.

cocktails.name: Irish Slammer
cocktails.description: The Irish Slammer (traditionally known by more controversial names like the "Irish Car Bomb") is a "bomb shot" cocktail consisting of **Irish whiskey**, **Irish cream**, and **Irish stout**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the 360ml of **Guinness** into a pint glass and let the foam settle.
2. Pour 15ml of **Irish cream** into a shot glass first, then layer 15ml of **Irish whiskey** on top.
3. Drop the shot glass into the Guinness and drink immediately. If it sits too long, the cream will curdle due to the acidity of the beer.

cocktails.name: Islander
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail for those who appreciate complex herbal notes. This drink blends the botanical richness of **red vermouth** with the smoky depth of **Scotch whisky**, finished with a subtle hint of **anise**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **red vermouth**, 22.5ml of **Scotch whisky**, and 5ml of **anisette**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine-strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Jack & Coke
cocktails.description: Simple and popular mix of jack daniel's and **cola**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Jack Daniels** and 150ml of **cola**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Jack Rose
cocktails.description: Early 20th Century classic of **apple brandy**, **lemon** and **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **calvados**, 22.5ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an **apple** slice or express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink.

cocktails.name: Jackie Welles
cocktails.description: The jackie welles is a signature cocktail from the video game cyberpunk 2077, famously ordered by the character jackie welles at the afterlife bar. In real-world bartending, the recipe is a variation of a **vodka** buck.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **lime juice**, 120ml of **ginger beer**, a splash of **grenadine**, and a wedge of **lime**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Jägerbomb
cocktails.description: A jägerbomb is a popular "bomb shot" cocktail consisting of a shot of **Jägermeister** dropped into a glass containing an energy drink, typically **Red Bull**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour roughly half a can (approx. 125ml) of chilled **Red Bull** into a large glass, such as a pint glass or highball.
2. Fill a standard shot glass with 45ml of chilled **Jägermeister**.
3. Drop the shot glass directly into the larger glass.
4. Drink immediately, typically in one go.

cocktails.name: Jagertee
cocktails.description: Jagertee (hunter's tea) is a traditional Austrian spiced, alcoholic punch, famous as an après-ski warmer made from a blend of inländer rum, **black tea**, spices, **sugar**, and fruit essences, often prepared with hot **water** or enjoyed chilled in summer as a strong iced tea.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 240ml of **black tea**, 240ml of **orange juice**, 240ml of **spiced rum**, and 240ml of **plum brandy** to a pot.
2. Add a **cinnamon** stick, 5 **cloves**, and 2 sliced **lemons**.
3. Simmer on low-medium heat for about 5 minutes. Do not let it boil.
4. Remove from heat.
5. Add 15ml of **honey**.
6. Stir gently to combine.
7. Strain in mugs.
8. Garnish each serving with an **orange** slice if desired.

cocktails.name: Jam Roly Poly
cocktails.description: A rich, sweet **gin** drink featuring a **raspberry** taste.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **raspberry liqueur** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of **egg liqueur** on top of the liqueur.

cocktails.name: Japanese Slipper
cocktails.description: This popular cocktail was created in 1984 by jean-paul bourguignon at mietta's restaurant in melbourne.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Midori Melon liqueur**, 45ml of **Cointreau**, and 45ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **honeydew melon** and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Jelly Bean
cocktails.description: Layered shooter with **grenadine**, **sambuca** and **Southern Comfort**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of **grenadine** into a shooter.
2. Carefully add 15ml of **sambuca** and 15ml of **Southern Comfort** on top of the **grenadine**.

cocktails.name: Jellyfish
cocktails.description: A jellyfish shooter is a layered drink that uses differing liquid densities to create the visual of a jellyfish "swimming" in the glass. There are two popular versions: the traditional creamy version and the vibrant "blue jellyfish".
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of crème de cacao white into a shooter glass.
2. Gently add 15ml of **amaretto** on top.
3. Gently pour 15ml of **Baileys** on top of the **amaretto**.
4. Add a few drops of **grenadine**.

cocktails.name: John Collins
cocktails.description: Refreshing **gin** highball with **lemon**, **sugar**, and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 60ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Johnny Silverhand
cocktails.description: A johnny silverhand is a fictional cocktail from the video game cyberpunk 2077 that has been adapted into several popular real-world recipes. It is generally described as a **Tequila Old Fashioned** with a **beer** float.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila añejo**, a bar spoon of **agave syrup**, 3 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and 30ml of **Corona**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** peel and a **chili pepper**.

cocktails.name: Jolly Rancher
cocktails.description: Named after the popular american candy brand.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **Midori Melon liqueur**, and 90ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Jungle Bird
cocktails.description: Tiki favorite blending **dark rum**, **Campari**, and **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **blackstrap rum**, 20ml of **Campari**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **demerara sugar syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple**.

cocktails.name: Kamikaze
cocktails.description: This popular cocktail is a variation of the original kamikaze shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **triple sec**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Kings County
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that balances the honeyed notes of highland **Scotch whisky** with a touch of Islay smoke and herbal complexity.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Scotch Highland whisky**, 10ml of **Islay Scotch whisky**, 10ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 10ml of **Punt e Mes**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry**, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish as well.

cocktails.name: Kir
cocktails.description: A classic French aperitif that elegantly combines the crispness of dry **white wine** with the sweet, dark fruit notes of blackcurrant liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 10ml of **Crème de Cassis** and 90ml of **white wine** to a wine glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Kir Royal
cocktails.description: An upscale, effervescent version of the classic kir, replacing still wine with **Champagne** for a celebratory and luxurious experience.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 90ml of **Champagne** and 10ml of **Crème de Cassis** to a flute glass.
2. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Ladykiller
cocktails.description: The very sweet and beautiful 1984 championship-winning cocktail created by Peter Roth from the Kronenhalle bar in Zürich.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 15ml of **apricot brandy**, 60ml of **passion fruit juice**, and 60ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice, and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Larkwood
cocktails.description: The larkwood is a herbal "sour" cocktail created by bartender Jason Clapham of Clapham Cocktails. It is a modern riff on the classic Last Word, substituting **green Chartreuse** with the czech spiced herbal liqueur **Becherovka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 22.5ml of **Becherovka**, 22.5ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 22.5ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled glass.
5. Garnish with **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Last Word
cocktails.description: Equal-parts **gin**, Chartreuse, maraschino, and **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 25ml of **gin**, 25ml of **green Chartreuse**, 25ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 25ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Lava Flow
cocktails.description: A lava flow is a visually striking hawaiian cocktail that combines a **strawberry daiquiri**-style base with a creamy **Piña Colada** top. The signature "lava" effect occurs when the denser **cream** mixture is poured over the **strawberry** base, causing the red puree to swirl upward along the sides of the glass.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **Malibu rum**, and 60g of **strawberry** to a blender. Blend until smooth and syrupy.
2. Pour the **strawberry** mixture into a tall hurricane or highball glass.
3. Add a **banana**, 60ml of **pineapple juice**, 60ml of **cream** of coconut, and 150g of **ice** to the blender. Blend until smooth and frothy.
4. Slowly pour the white mixture into the center of the glass over the **strawberry** base to create a layered effect.
5. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and serve.

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.description: An IBA official variation of the martini drink that is served as an all-day cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **triple sec**, and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass, rimmed with **sugar**.
5. Garnish with **lemon** peel.

cocktails.name: Light Word
cocktails.description: A complex **gin** cocktail where **gin**, **Campari**, **green Chartreuse** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Campari**, 30ml of **green Chartreuse**, and 30ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Liquorice
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that highlights the botanical notes of **gin** balanced by the deep, **anise**-flavored complexity of **black sambuca**. This drink is smooth, aromatic, and perfect for those who enjoy bold, herbal profiles.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 7.5ml of **black sambuca**, 5ml of **rich simple syrup**, and a stalk of **liquorice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: Lisbon Martini
cocktails.description: A refined european twist on the classic **Martini**. The rich, fruity notes of **port** wine blend seamlessly with the crispness of **gin** and the delicate floral sweetness of **St-Germain** elderflower liqueur, finished with a citrusy dash of **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **port**, 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **St-Germain**, and a dash of **Bittermens Boston Bittahs**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel and a **chamomile flowers**.

cocktails.name: London Calling
cocktails.description: Created in 2002 in London's "Milk & Honey" bar by Chris Jepson for a magazine competition. A well-known variation is the "**Banana Calling".
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Fino sherry**, 10ml of **lemon juice**, 10ml of **simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **grapefruit**.

cocktails.name: Long Beach Iced Tea
cocktails.description: A variation of the long island iced tea with **cranberry juice** instead of **cola**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **gin**, 15ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **orange liqueur**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 60ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.description: Five-spirit sour lengthened with **cola**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 25ml of **lemon juice**, and 30ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Top with a splash of **Coca-Cola**.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Longshoreman
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward **whiskey** drink built around **Punt e Mes**, rye whisky, and **amaro**. It is bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well-chilled in a rocks glass with a fresh **orange** twist.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 45ml of **rye whiskey**, and 15ml of **amaro**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Love & Murder
cocktails.description: A bright and complex liqueur sour that balances the bitterness of **Campari** with the herbal notes of **green Chartreuse** and fresh **lime**. A crisp, refreshing, and vibrant cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Campari**, 30ml of **green Chartreuse**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 20ml of **simple syrup**, and a dash of **salt**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Lovelight
cocktails.description: An elegant and sophisticated **brandy**-based drink. It combines the warmth of **Cognac** with the spicy depth of **cinnamon** and **chocolate bitters**, rounded out by bitter and vermouth notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **Cognac**, 20ml of **strucchi bitter**, 10ml of **red vermouth**, 5ml of **cinnamon syrup**, and 2 dashes of **chocolate bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

cocktails.name: Lucien Gaudin
cocktails.description: A cocktail named after lucien gaudin, a French fencer who won two gold medals in the 1924 and 1928 olympic games, named similarly to the Negroni, with the addition of **orange liqueur** and with **dry vermouth** instead of sweet vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 15ml of **Campari**, and 15ml of **dry vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Lynchburg Lemonade
cocktails.description: A popular cocktail named after lynchburg, tennessee, the hometown of the jack daniel's distillery.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Jack Daniels**, 15ml of **triple sec**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 100ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: Rum-forward tiki classic with **orange curaçao**, **lime**, and orgeat.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **dark rum**, 15ml of **orange curaçao**, 15ml of almond(orgeat) syrup, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 7.5ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a sprig of **mint** and a slice of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Malibu Bay Breeze
cocktails.description: A simple, light and delicious cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Malibu rum**, 60ml of **cranberry juice**, and 60ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **pineapple** slice.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: Spirit-forward mix of **bourbon**, **sweet vermouth**, and **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Manhattan Dry
cocktails.description: A good pre-dinner cocktail that is a variation of the Manhattan with **dry vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **bourbon**, 20ml of **dry vermouth**, and a dash of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Cuban Manhattan
cocktails.description: Also called perfect Manhattan, this is a combination of Manhattan and Manhattan dry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **dark rum**, 10ml of **dry vermouth**, 10ml of **red vermouth**, and a dash of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
