1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 30ml of **agave syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Tootsie Roll
cocktails.description: This nice and mild shot is an attempt to recall the famous "tootsie roll" candy. The recipe here is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **coffee liqueur**, 45ml of **orange juice**, and 45ml of **vodka**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Triffle
cocktails.description: A layered shooter that balances sweet **grenadine** with creamy **egg liqueur** and **whipped cream**. Rich, dessert-like, and served as a quick indulgent sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 10ml of **grenadine** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 45ml of **egg liqueur** on the top.
3. Pour **whipped cream** on the top.

cocktails.name: Trinidad Sour
cocktails.description: **Bitters**-heavy sour with rye and orgeat for balance.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Angostura bitters**, 30ml of almond(orgeat) syrup, 20ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **rye whiskey**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: Tropical Bananarama
cocktails.description: A tropical banana-forward cocktail with creamy coconut and bright citrus accents.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **whiskey cream**, **cream**, half a fresh **banana**, and **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until silky smooth.
3. Pour into a hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a fresh **banana** slice.

cocktails.name: Tropical Queen
cocktails.description: An elegant and exotic **gin**-based delight that balances the botanical notes of **gin** with creamy coconut and a warm hint of **cinnamon**. Fresh citrus and **grapefruit** juices add a vibrant, refreshing finish perfect for a sunset escape.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 5ml of **coconut liqueur**, 5ml of **simple syrup**, 5ml of **cinnamon syrup**, 15ml of **lime juice**, 30ml of **grapefruit juice**, and 15ml of **coconut water**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **cinnamon sticks**.

cocktails.name: Tropical Sangria
cocktails.description: A light and effervescent twist on the classic Sangria. This refreshing pitcher drink features crisp **white wine** and coconut notes, macerated with fresh **orange**, **kiwi fruit**, and strawberries for a colorful, shareable summer treat.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pitcher with **ice**.
2. Add 240ml of **coconut liqueur**, 750ml of **white wine**, 45ml of **simple syrup**, 120ml of **soda water**, a half of **orange**, a **kiwi fruit**, and 7 sliced strawberries.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Tuxedo
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and complex dry **gin** martini variation from the late 19th Century. The addition of maraschino liqueur and a hint of **absinthe** creates a herbal, slightly sweet profile that is both elegant and timeless.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Old Tom gin**, 30ml of **dry vermouth**, 0.5 teaspoons of **Luxardo maraschino**, a drop of **absinthe**, and 3 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Vacation in Jamaica
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring **gold rum**, **coconut liqueur**, and **caramel syrup**. It is dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent, offering a tropical escape in a glass.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the **gold rum**, **coconut liqueur**, **caramel syrup**, **apple juice**, **heavy cream**, and **banana** into a blender.
2. Add about 15g of **ice**.
3. Blend until the consistency is smooth and creamy.
4. Pour the contents into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with **coconut flakes**, a **banana** slice, and a sprig of fresh **mint**.

cocktails.name: Vampiro
cocktails.description: A vibrant and spicy Mexican-style cocktail. It is a savory blend of **Tequila** and fruit juices, enhanced with **honey**, onion, and chili for a complex, bold kick.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila reposado**, 70ml of **tomato juice**, 30ml of **orange juice**, 7.5ml of **lime juice**, a teaspoon of **honey**, 0.5 peels of **silver onion**, 3 slices of red **chili pepper**, 3 drops of **worcestershire sauce**, and a pinch of **salt**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime** and a slice of red **chili pepper**.

cocktails.name: Ve.n.to
cocktails.description: An elegant **grappa**-based sour that beautifully balances the intensity of the spirit with the soothing notes of chamomile and **honey syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **grappa**, 25ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **honey syrup**, 15ml of **chamomile cordial**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish, and garnish with 3 **grapes**.

cocktails.name: Vegas Bomb
cocktails.description: A sweet and energetic bomb shot combining whisky, **peach schnapps** and **Red Bull**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **peach schnapps**, and 150ml of **Red Bull** to a pub glass.
2. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.description: James bond's martini with **gin**, **vodka**, and **Lillet Blanc**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **gin**, 30ml of **vodka**, and 15ml of **Lillet Blanc**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carré
cocktails.description: New orleans classic combining rye, **Cognac**, vermouth, and **Benedictine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, a bar spoon of **Benedictine**, 2 dashes of **Peychaud's bitters**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Vilno
cocktails.description: A sweet layered shooter with bright fruit notes and a soft creamy texture.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of **grenadine** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully layer 15ml of **Crème de Menthe Green** over the back of a spoon.
3. Gently float 15ml of **Irish cream** on top to finish the layered shot.

cocktails.name: Virgin Bananarama
cocktails.description: A non-alcoholic banana-forward tropical drink with creamy coconut and bright citrus accents.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 150g of **ice**, 120ml of **apricot nectar**, 45ml of **coconut milk**, and a half of **banana** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with a **banana** slice.

cocktails.name: Virgin Colada
cocktails.description: A non-alcoholic variation of the **Piña Colada**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 150g of crushed **ice** to a blender.
2. Add 30ml of **coconut milk** and 120ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Blend until smooth, then pour into a hurricane glass.
4. Top with 30ml of **whipped cream**, then garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mary
cocktails.description: A non-alcoholic version of the "Bloody Mary" cocktail. It is also called the "bloody shame", "bloody virgin" or "bloody barbara".
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **tomato juice**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 1 dash of **Tabasco**, 2 dashes of **worcestershire sauce**, 1 pinch of **salt**, and 1 pinch of **black pepper**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **celery** stalk.

cocktails.name: Virgin Sangria
cocktails.description: A refreshing non-alcoholic take on the classic Sangria. This vibrant mocktail combines deep grape and crisp **apple** flavors with a splash of citrus, topped with sparkling soda for a light, festive finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pitcher with 300g of **ice**.
2. Add 240ml of **grape juice**, 60ml of **apple juice**, 60ml of **orange juice**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 30ml of **simple syrup**, and 120ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice, an **orange** slice, and 2 **apple** cubes.

cocktails.name: Virginia
cocktails.description: A smooth and tropical delight that brings the beach to your glass. The creamy notes of **coconut liqueur** blend perfectly with the tartness of cranberry and **lime** for a balanced, exotic escape.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **coconut liqueur**, 150ml of **cranberry juice**, and 22.5ml of **lime juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Vodka Buck
cocktails.description: **Vodka** and **ginger beer** built over **ice** with a bright **lime** kick.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a copper mug with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 10ml of **lime juice**, and 120ml of **ginger beer** to a copper mug.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Vodka Martini
cocktails.description: This is a **vodka**-based variation of the martini cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka** and 15ml of **dry vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish, and garnish with an **olive**.

cocktails.name: Vodka Rickey
cocktails.description: A quintessential highball that defines crisp simplicity. This variation of the classic rickey swap spirits for **vodka**, resulting in a clean, bubbly, and incredibly refreshing drink with a sharp citrus kick.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 100ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Ward 8
cocktails.description: A classic **whiskey** cocktail with citrus and a touch of **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **orange juice**, and a dash of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Washington Apple
cocktails.description: Combining whisky, sour **apple schnapps**, and **cranberry juice**, this cocktail delivers a lovely balance of flavors that are both sweet and tart.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **whiskey**, 30ml of **apple schnapps**, and 30ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **apple**.

cocktails.name: Water Moccasin
cocktails.description: Named after the venomous snake, this shooter blends **peach schnapps** with **rye whiskey** and citrus.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **peach schnapps**, 15ml of **triple sec**, 7.5ml of **lemon juice**, and 7.5ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: Weng Weng
cocktails.description: A strong Filipino long drink that combines multiple spirits with fruit juices and **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 10ml of **vodka**, 10ml of **gin**, 10ml of **white rum**, 10ml of **Scotch whisky**, 10ml of **bourbon**, 10ml of **Tequila blanco**, 10ml of **triple sec**, 10ml of **brandy**, 10ml of **coconut rum**, 20ml of **orange juice**, 20ml of **pineapple juice**, a dash of **grenadine**, and a **cherry**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Rebellion
cocktails.description: **Whiskey** and pimm's combine with citrus and syrup for a refreshing twist.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 37.5ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **Pimm's No. 1**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: Classic **bourbon** sour optionally enriched with **egg white**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with an **orange** slice a **maraschino cherry**, and 3 drops of **Angostura bitters**.

cocktails.name: White Christmas Martini
cocktails.description: A festive and creamy spirit-forward cocktail that blends smooth **vanilla** **vodka** with a refreshing peppermint kick. This elegant drink is perfectly balanced with **half-and-half** for a velvety texture, making it a sophisticated choice for holiday celebrations.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka vanilla**, 30ml of **peppermint schnapps**, and 30ml of **half-and-half**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **peppermint candy**.

cocktails.name: White Lady
cocktails.description: A crisp and sophisticated classic **gin** sour. The bright citrus notes of **lemon** and the **orange** sweetness of **triple sec** create a clean, refreshing profile with a beautiful silky finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 30ml of **triple sec**, and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: White Lebowski
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy classic cocktail that perfectly balances the kick of **vodka** with the sweetness of **coffee liqueur**, topped with a velvety layer of fresh **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice** cubes.
2. Pour the **vodka** and **coffee liqueur** over the **ice**.
3. Gently pour the **cream** on top so it swirls into the dark liquid.
4. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: White Negroni
cocktails.description: A modern variation of the classic Negroni, replacing **Campari** and sweet vermouth with **Suze** and **Lillet Blanc** for a drier herbal bitterness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Suze**, and 30ml of **Lillet Blanc**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Wizard of Oz
cocktails.description: An enchanting tropical drink that combines coconut and melon liqueurs with a vibrant blend of **orange** and **pineapple** juices for a refreshing, emerald-hued escape.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **coconut liqueur**, 30ml of **melon liqueur**, 90ml of **orange juice**, and 90ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge and a **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Woo Woo
cocktails.description: A fruity cocktail combining **vodka**, **peach schnapps**, and **cranberry juice** for a smooth, approachable profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **peach schnapps**, and 120ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Writer's Coffee
cocktails.description: A rich coffee cocktail with **dark rum**, **Kahlua** and maraschino liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **dark rum**, 45ml of **coffee liqueur**, 15ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 5ml of **caramel syrup**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Yamabuki
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and harmonious blend where the depth of **Japanese whisky** meets the herbal sweetness of **bianco vermouth** and **Amaro Montenegro**. This cocktail offers a perfectly structured balance of citrus brightness and bittersweet complexity.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Japanese whisky**, 22.5ml of **bianco vermouth**, 15ml of **Amaro Montenegro**, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Yellow Bird
cocktails.description: An IBA official all-day cocktail combining **white rum**, **Galliano**, **triple sec** and **lime**, served in a highball glass.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **Galliano**, 15ml of **triple sec**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass over **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Yo Ho
cocktails.description: A refreshing and effervescent long drink that captures the spirit of the mediterranean. It combines the crispness of **white rum** with zesty **limoncello** and sparkling **lemon tonic** for an easy-sipping summer experience.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **limoncello**, and 100ml of **lemon tonic**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.description: A legendary and potent tiki classic that blends multiple rums, fresh **lime**, and tropical spice for a complex, sun-soaked experience.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **Jamaican dark rum**, 45ml **gold Puerto Rican rum**, **demerara rum**, fresh **lime juice**, **falernum**, **don's mix**, **grenadine**, **Angostura bitters**, and **Pernod** into a blender.
2. Add 180g of crushed **ice**.
3. Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.
4. Pour the contents into a tall glass or tiki glass and add additional crushed **ice** to fill if necessary.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Zombie Brain Tumor
cocktails.description: A dramatic layered shooter with minty sweetness, creamy body, and a vivid grenadine accent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **Crème de Menthe Green** into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly layer 20ml of **Baileys**(**Irish cream** liqueur) so it forms a brain-like shape.
3. Add 5ml of **grenadine**, a drop at a time to create a bleeding effect.

cocktails.name: After Midnight
cocktails.description: A bittersweet, orange and maraschino-influenced riff on a Rob Roy.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Scotch whisky**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15ml of **orange curaçao**, 7.5ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 6 dashes of **vanilla bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: After Midnight Martini
cocktails.description: A late-night alternative to an Espresso Martini.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 22.5ml of **vodka**, 22.5ml of **coffee liqueur**, 22.5ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Add about 150g of **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain back into the shaker.
5. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
6. Fine strain into a chilled glass.
7. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans** floated in the centre.

cocktails.name: Brown Derby
cocktails.description: A classic 1930s Hollywood staple, the Brown Derby is a bright, refreshing cocktail that balances the warmth of **bourbon** with the tartness of **grapefruit juice** and the floral sweetness of **maple syrup** or **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **grapefruit juice**, and 15ml of **maple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine-strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Fancy Free
cocktails.description: Aromatised, tamed **bourbon** with complex maraschino notes. Basically, a whiskey Old Fashioned with **maraschino liqueur** in place of **sugar syrup**. Surprisingly dry, helped by generous dashes of **orange** and **aromatic bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 12.5ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 3 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Irish Maid
cocktails.description: The Irish Maid is a refreshing, floral "modern classic" cocktail that serves as the **Irish whiskey** variation of the Kentucky Maid (originally created by Sam Ross). It is defined by its crisp combination of muddled **cucumber**, **elderflower**, and **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 2 **cucumber slices** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 60ml of **Irish whiskey**, 15ml of **St-Germain**, 20ml of **lemon juice**, and 10ml of **rich simple syrup** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a thin **cucumber slice**.

cocktails.name: Kentucky Maid
cocktails.description: The Kentucky Maid is a refreshing, floral "modern classic" cocktail. It is defined by its crisp combination of muddled **cucumber**, **mint**, **elderflower**, and **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 2 **cucumber slices** and 6 **mint leaves** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 20ml of **rich simple syrup** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a thin **cucumber slice**.

cocktails.name: Shandy
cocktails.description: **Shandy** is a light and refreshing beer cocktail traditionally made by mixing equal parts beer and a non-alcoholic beverage. Popular as a thirst-quencher in the UK and Europe, it is prized for its low alcohol content and crisp citrus profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a chilled pint glass with 240ml of **beer**. Tip the glass slightly while pouring to reduce foam.
2. Top with 240ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Black Manhattan
cocktails.description: Black Manhattan is a modern, riff on the classic cocktail created by bartender Todd Smith in 2005. It substitutes the traditional sweet vermouth with Amaro Averna, creating a darker, more complex, and herbal flavour profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **amaro**, a dash of **Angostura bitters**, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain the cocktail into a coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Monte & Tonic
cocktails.description: Bittersweet and very refreshing cocktail with hints of zesty citrus freshness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a glass with about **ice**.
2. Pour in 50ml of **Amaro Montenegro** and 120ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice wheel.

cocktails.name: Greta Garbo
cocktails.description: A deliciously clean and cleansing daiquiri with delicate notes of **maraschino** and **anise**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 7.5ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 5ml of **anis**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into chilled glass.
5. Garnish with star anise floated on the surface.

cocktails.name: Northern Light
cocktails.description: Wonderfully refreshing: apple and anise served up on a grassy **vodka** base. Similar to the **Szarlotka** cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Bizon Grass vodka**, 22.5ml of **apple schnapps**, 15ml of **anis**, 30ml of **apple juice**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **rich simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into chilled glass.
5. Garnish with a star anise floated on the surface.

cocktails.name: Apple Jack
cocktails.description: Sweet and sour with rich apple flavours and a brandy backbone.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **applejack**, 15ml of **apple cider**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 10ml of **rich simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Apple Pie (shot)
cocktails.description: Nuts, apple, cinnamon and cream.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **apple schnapps**, and 45ml of **Hazelnut liqueur**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into chilled shooter glasses.
5. Float 15ml of **cream** on top.
6. Dust with 3 pinches of **cinnamon**.

cocktails.name: Bloody Bull
cocktails.description: A savory, Bloody Mary-style highball that combines **vodka**, **tomato juice**, and beef bouillon with spice and umami depth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker tin with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka**, 50ml of **beef bouillon**, 50ml of **tomato juice**, 5ml of **rich simple syrup**, a dash of **lemon juice**, 3 dashes of **Worcestershire sauce**, a pinch of **celery salt**, a pinch of **black pepper**, and 2 pinches of **salt**.
3. Add plenty of **ice** to the tin with the ingredients.
4. Hold a second empty tin below and slightly to the side of the first tin.
5. Pour the cocktail in a long, controlled stream from the first tin into the second tin to aerate and chill it.
6. Pour the liquid back into the first tin in the same way.
7. Repeat the back-and-forth throw 5 times.
8. Strain into a highball glass filled with **ice**.
9. Garnish with an **olive**.

cocktails.name: Apple Shot
cocktails.description: A fruity, lightly sparkling shooter that blends **whiskey**, **apple schnapps**, and **cranberry juice** for a sweet-tart finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 20ml of **whiskey**, 15ml of **apple schnapps**, and 20ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.
5. Top with 10ml of **soda water**.

cocktails.name: Apple Strudel
cocktails.description: Apple, vanilla and a hint of **Scotch** and **cinnamon** — reminiscent of the dessert but a good deal drier.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Rim a glass with cinnamon and sugar (moisten the outside edge with sugar syrup and dip into cinnamon powder).
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **whiskey**, 15ml of **Berentzen Apfelkorn**, 15ml of **dry vermouth**, 15ml of **apple juice**, and 5ml of **cinnamon syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into the chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Berry Spritz
cocktails.description: A refreshing berry spritz with bright fruit notes, sparkling wine, and a light soda finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 40g of **berries** with 20ml of **lime juice** in a rocks glass.
2. Add **ice** and pour in the **prosecco**.
3. Top with **soda water**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge, then serve.

cocktails.name: Mixed Berry Sangria
cocktails.description: A fruit-forward sangria made with **red wine**, **berries**, **orange**, and a touch of **brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a large pitcher, muddle 300g of **berries**, an **orange** (sliced), and 45ml of **sugar**.
2. Add 750ml of **red wine**, 90ml of **brandy**, 180ml of **orange juice**, and 300g of **ice**.
3. Add 180ml of **soda water** if you want a lighter style.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Chill.
6. Serve over ice and garnish with extra **berries**.

cocktails.name: Blackberry Martini
cocktails.description: A bright berry-forward martini variation with **gin**, **blackberry liqueur**, and citrus, shaken and served chilled.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 6 **blackberries** with 15ml of **blackberry liqueur** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with 2 fresh **blackberries**.

cocktails.name: Blueberry Martini
cocktails.description: A fresh, fruit-driven martini with muddled **blueberries**, **gin** (or **vodka**), and citrus for a crisp aromatic profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle blueberries and **Blueberry schnapps** (or **simple syrup**) in the bottom of a cocktail shaker.
2. Add the **gin** (or **vodka**), **lemon juice**, and a handful of **ice** to the shaker.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with 1 or 2 fresh **blueberries**.

cocktails.name: Brandy Manhattan
cocktails.description: Spirit-forward mix of **brandy**, **sweet vermouth**, and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **brandy**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Metropolitan
cocktails.description: A Manhattan-style classic with **red vermouth**, **rye whiskey**, and aromatic **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **red vermouth**, 30ml of **rye whiskey**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Bishop
cocktails.description: A flavoursome and warming variation on mulled wine.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 7 **cloves** in the base of a shaker.
2. Add 15ml of **honey syrup**, 90ml of **boiling water**, 75ml of **tawny port**, and 30ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake briefly to combine and chill slightly.
4. Fine strain into a heatproof glass and serve warm.

cocktails.name: Cherry Smash
cocktails.description: A juicy whiskey smash with muddled cherries, **bourbon**, and a splash of soda for a refreshing long sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 6 pitted **cherries** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 22.5ml of **cherry liqueur**, 7.5ml of **simple syrup**, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Top with 60ml of **soda water**.
7. Garnish with 2 whole **cherries**.

cocktails.name: Apicius
cocktails.description: This digestif cocktail is aromatic and bittersweet with herbal and botanical complexity rounded by rich chestnut liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 10ml of **chestnut liqueur**, 10ml of **orange curaçao**, 5ml of **Strucchi bitter**, and 5ml of **Fernet Branca**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Adult Chocolate Milk
cocktails.description: A dessert-style cocktail that blends chocolate liqueur, cream liqueur, milk, and cream into a chilled, silky serve.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of Godiva dark chocolate liqueur, 15ml of **Baileys**, 60ml of whole **milk**, 15ml of heavy **cream**, and 15ml of **chocolate syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with 2 pinches of grated **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Mure Royale
cocktails.description: A simple, elegant drink made by adding a splash of **blackberry liqueur** to a glass of chilled **Champagne** or **sparkling wine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour a teaspoon of **Crème de Mure** into a chilled Champagne glass.
2. Top with 120ml of chilled **Champagne**.
3. Garnish with a fresh **blackberry**.

cocktails.name: Blue Moon
cocktails.description: It is a classic, floral cocktail often described as the simpler "cousin" to the Aviation. While an Aviation includes maraschino liqueur, the blue Moon relies solely on **Crème de Violette** for its distinctive purple-grey hue and botanical sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Crème de Violette**, and 15ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into the chilled glass, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Cynar Spritz
cocktails.description: A bittersweet spritz combining **Cynar**, **prosecco**, and **soda water**, finished with a bright grapefruit garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a wine glass full of ice combine 90ml of **prosecco** and 60ml of **Cynar**.
2. Add 30ml of **soda water**.
3. Garnish with a **grapefruit** slice.

cocktails.name: Bitter Giuseppe
cocktails.description: A bittersweet, aperitif-style sipper built on **Cynar** and vermouth, lifted by citrus oils and a touch of saline complexity.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Squeeze the oils from a **lemon** zest into a mixing glass and drop the zest in.
3. Add 60ml of **Cynar**, 30ml of **Carpano Antica Formula Vermouth**, 7.5ml of **lemon juice**, and 3 dashes of **orange bitters**.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Express a fresh **lemon** zest over the cocktail and use it as garnish.

cocktails.name: Dutch Coffee
cocktails.description: A creamy coffee cocktail featuring **Advocaat**, **cream**, and **espresso**, shaken until silky and served cold.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Advocaat**, 30ml of **cream**, and 120ml of **espresso**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a cup and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Nutty Martini
cocktails.description: Martini variation with **Frangelico** (**hazelnut liqueur**) and **simple syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 22.5ml of **Frangelico**, and a bar spoon of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Black Velvet
cocktails.description: Full-bodied stout and delicate dry sparkling wine are an unlikely combination but this classic has stood the test of time. Some may wish to add a barspoon of sugar syrup.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 75ml of **Guinness** into a chilled flute glass.
2. Slowly top with 75ml of **prosecco**.
3. Optionally add a bar spoon of **simple syrup** for a slightly sweeter serve.

cocktails.name: Nutty Lebowski
cocktails.description: Black Lebowski with hazelnut liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **hazelnut liqueur**, and 30ml of **coffee liqueur**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a walnut half on the rim.

cocktails.name: Hpnotiq Breeze
cocktails.description: The Hpnotiq Breeze (also known as the Hypnotic Breeze) is a tropical cocktail featuring Hpnotiq, a sky-blue French liqueur made from **vodka**, **Cognac**, and tropical fruit juices. The drink is known for its vibrant blue hue and refreshing, sweet-tart profile that blends passionfruit, mango, and citrus flavours.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 75ml of **Hpnotiq**, 30ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a hurricane or martini glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Slowly pour 15ml of **pineapple juice** into the center to create the temporary tie-dye effect.
6. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Surfer On Acid
cocktails.description: Slightly sweet and very fruity – who'd have guessed **Jägermeister** would work so well with the classic coconut rum and pineapple juice combo.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Jägermeister**, 30ml of **coconut rum**, and 45ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Surfer on Acid (shot)
cocktails.description: The Surfer on Acid is a popular 1990s cocktail known for its simple equal-parts recipe and unusual combination of herbal and tropical flavours. Created by Los Angeles bartender Eric Tecosky, it is versatile enough to be served as a refreshing long drink or a quick party shot.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Into a shaker with **ice** pour 45ml of **coconut rum** and 45ml of **pineapple juice**.
2. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
3. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.
4. Carefully layer each drink with 15ml of **Jägermeister**.

cocktails.name: Kiwi Fruit Martini
cocktails.description: A tropical-fruit Martini with muddled kiwi, citrus, and a clean **vodka** base.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Cut a **kiwi fruit** in half and cut an additional slice for garnish. Scoop the flesh from both halves into the base of a shaker.
2. Muddle the kiwi fruit flesh thoroughly.
3. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **Strucchi Bitter**, and 5ml of **kiwi fruit liqueur**.
4. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Fine strain into a chilled martini glass.
7. Garnish with the kiwi fruit slice.

cocktails.name: Kiwi Fruit Margarita
cocktails.description: This is a refreshing, tropical twist on the classic cocktail that can be prepared either blended (frozen) or shaken (on the rocks). It typically features fresh, ripe kiwis, **Tequila**, **lime juice**, and a sweetener like **agave** or **simple syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. If you prefer a salted rim, rub the edge of the glass with a **lime** wedge and dip it in **salt**.
2. Cut 1 **kiwi fruit** into pieces (save a slice for garnish) and muddle it in a shaker.
3. Add 150g of **ice**, 60ml of **Tequila reposado**, 30ml of **triple sec**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 30ml of **agave syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Garnish with a **kiwi fruit** slice.

cocktails.name: Alligator
cocktails.description: Alligator is a popular green cocktail that prominently features kiwi fruit liqueur or fresh kiwi fruit to achieve its signature swamp-like hue and tropical flavour profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**.
3. Add 30ml of **lemon juice**.
4. Add 22.5ml of **kiwi fruit liqueur**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into a martini glass.
7. Garnish with a **kiwi fruit** slice.

cocktails.name: Gennaro's Sidecar
cocktails.description: Gennaro's Sidecar is an Italian-inspired twist on the classic **Sidecar** cocktail, created by chef Gennaro Contaldo (mentor to Jamie Oliver). The signature addition of **limoncello** adds a sweeter, vibrant citrus layer to the traditional **Cognac** and **triple sec** base.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cognac**, 22.5ml of **triple sec**, 15ml of **limoncello**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 10ml of **water**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into chilled glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Amalfi Spritz
cocktails.description: A refreshing, delicately bittersweet, sweet-and-sour, and more interesting take on a **Limoncello Spritz**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a chilled wine glass, add 45ml of **limoncello**, 7.5ml of **Strucchi Bitter**, 7.5ml of **lemon juice**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
2. Top with 90ml of **prosecco**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Add **ice** to chill and dilute slightly.
5. Garnish with 2 **lemon** slices.

cocktails.name: Limoncello Spritz
cocktails.description: Zesty, almost creamy, **lemon** enlivened with fizz.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a glass with about **ice**.
2. Pour in 45ml of **limoncello**, 30ml of **prosecco**, and 15ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: PX Flip
cocktails.description: Lighter in alcohol, but still very full of flavour, this is a modern classic that is hugely popular during winter.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 4 **cloves** in the bottom of a shaker.
2. Add 60ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, 20ml of **lemon juice**, 10ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg yolk**.
3. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
4. Add about 150g of **ice**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into a chilled glass.
7. Garnish with a pinch of grated **cinnamon**.

cocktails.name: Pimm's Cup
cocktails.description: A refreshing British highball built with **Pimm's No. 1**, citrus, cucumber, and sparkling mixers for a light, summer-ready serve.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Pimm's No. 1**.
3. Add a slice of **orange**, a slice of **lemon**, a slice of **cucumber**, and 2 **strawberry** slices.
4. Add more **ice**, then top with 60ml of **lemonade** and 75ml of **ginger ale**.
5. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Summer Cup
cocktails.description: A great cocktail that pairs fabulous ingredients with the mood and the moment.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 4 halves of **strawberry**, an **orange** slice, a **lemon** slice, and 4 **mint** leaves.
3. Pour in 30ml of **gin** and 30ml of **Pimm's No. 1**.
4. Top with 180ml of **lemonade**.
5. Stir gently to combine.
6. Garnish with extra **mint** leaves.

cocktails.name: Bay Ridge
cocktails.description: Created in 2014 by Tom Macy at the iconic Clover Club in Brooklyn, this is a spirit-forward, complex riff on the Manhattan. It is noted for its use of prune brandy, which adds a deep, stone-fruit sweetness that balances the spicy rye.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **dry vermouth**, 15ml of **Benedictine**, 7.5ml of **plum brandy**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into chilled glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Jerez
cocktails.description: Sherry depth and stoned fruit flavours.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **Fino sherry**, 15ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, 30ml of **peach schnapps**, 30ml of **Sauvignon Blanc**, 30ml of **plum brandy**, and 1 dash of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

cocktails.name: Cuban Bishop
cocktails.description: Cuban Bishop is a sophisticated, wine-fortified cocktail that balances the depth of Cuban rum and dry red wine with a sharp, refreshing touch of lime and sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cuban rum**, 30ml of **red wine**, 7.5ml of **lime juice**, and 7.5ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Raspberry Collins
cocktails.description: A popular modern-day adaptation of the classic collins with a whopping amount of **lemon juice**, yet it is far from being overly sour.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 10 **raspberries** in the base of the shaker.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **raspberry liqueur**, 45ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice** and shake for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a glass filled with **ice**.
5. Top with 30ml of **soda water**.
6. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
7. Garnish with a skewered **lemon** wheel and a **raspberry**.

cocktails.name: Rhum Marianito
cocktails.description: An aromatic, spirit-forward riff on the Marianito style, pairing vermouth and rhum agricole with citrus and olive garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 75ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **Rhum Martinique Agricole**, 15ml of **orange curaçao**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and 1 pinch of **salt**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish, alongside 2 olives.

cocktails.name: Pastis Whisky Sour
cocktails.description: Pastis adds a pleasing hint of anise and liquorice to a classic **Scotch whisky sour**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 50ml of **Scotch whisky**, 10ml of **Ricard**, 25ml of **lemon juice**, 12.5ml of **rich simple syrup**, an **egg white**, and 3 dashes of **Angostura bitters** to a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a skewered **lemon** wheel and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Mauresque
cocktails.description: A long, refreshing highball with anise, liquorice, and almond notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Put 120g of **ice** (preferably a large cube) in a rocks glass.
2. Add 30ml of **absinthe** and 20ml of **almond syrup**.
3. Top with 120ml of chilled **water**.
4. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Ruby Manhattan
cocktails.description: Rye whiskey with a touch of apricot and grape fruitiness served short, dry and strong. A delicious nightcap.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **rye**, 30ml of **ruby port**, 7.5ml of **apricot brandy**, and 2 dashes of **Creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Porto Tonico
cocktails.description: The Porto Tonico is Portugal’s version of the gin and tonic. This light, refreshing cocktail is made with just white port and tonic water. It’s the perfect easy-sipping drink for warm days, casual get-togethers, or whenever you want something chic and unexpected.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a glass with about **ice**.
2. Pour in 45ml of **White Port** and 90ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Sloe Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: A sloe gin Fizz is a refreshing, ruby-coloured twist on the classic gin Fizz that swaps standard gin for **sloe gin** — a British liqueur made from bittersweet blackthorn berries. It is known for its balance of tart, sweet, and fruity notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **sloe gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **rich simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Top with 60ml of **sparkling wine**.
6. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: St-Germain Spritz
cocktails.description: A light, refreshing spritz combining **St-Germain**, sparkling wine, and soda water with a floral profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a wine glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **St-Germain**, 60ml of **prosecco**, and 60ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Martini
cocktails.description: Rich strawberries fortified with **vodka** and a hint of pepper spice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 5 **strawberries** in the base of a shaker.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **strawberry liqueur**, and a pinch of **black pepper**.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled martini glass.
6. Garnish with a **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mojito
cocktails.description: A refreshing non-alcoholic twist on the classic mojito with **mint**, **lime**, **sugar syrup**, and sparkling **soda water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 10 **mint** leaves and 15ml of **demerara sugar syrup** to a highball glass, then gently muddle.
2. Add 20ml of **lime juice** and fill the glass with **ice**.
3. Top with 120ml of **soda water**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig and a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Arnold Palmer
cocktails.description: A classic zero-proof mix of chilled **black tea** and **lemonade**, light and easy to drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 100ml of **black tea** and 100ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Cinderella
cocktails.description: A fruity and citrus-forward non-alcoholic cocktail balanced with a touch of grenadine and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **orange juice**, 60ml of **pineapple juice**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 10ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 50ml of **soda water** and stir gently.
6. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Ipanema
cocktails.description: A Brazilian-inspired non-alcoholic long drink with muddled lime, sugar, and ginger ale.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 2 wedges of **lime** and 2 teaspoons of **sugar** to a rocks glass.
2. Gently muddle to release the lime oils and juice.
3. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
4. Top with 120ml of **ginger ale**.
5. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: St. Clements
cocktails.description: A brisk citrus cooler built from orange and lemon juice, finished with sparkling soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 75ml of **orange juice**, 45ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **Demerara sugar syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass with fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 60ml of **soda water** and stir gently.
6. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktails.name: Lime Rickey (Non-Alcoholic)
cocktails.description: A tart and sparkling lime refresher with no alcohol and a clean finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **lime juice** and 30ml of **Demerara sugar syrup**.
3. Top with 150ml of **soda water**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Pussyfoot
cocktails.description: A classic prohibition-era fruit mocktail combining citrus and tropical juices with grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **orange juice**, 60ml of **grapefruit juice**, 30ml of **pineapple juice**, and 10ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a hurricane glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Virgin Piña Colada
cocktails.description: A creamy tropical favorite with pineapple and coconut, blended to a smooth frozen texture.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 90ml of **pineapple juice**, 60ml of **coconut cream**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and frosty.
3. Pour into a hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge.

cocktails.name: Italian Cream Soda
cocktails.description: A sweet and fizzy dessert-style mocktail with flavored syrup, soda, and cream.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 25ml of **grenadine** and 120ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Float 30ml of **cream** on top.
5. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
6. Garnish with **whipped cream** and a **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Cucumber Cooler
cocktails.description: A crisp and cooling non-alcoholic highball made with cucumber, citrus, and apple juice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 4 slices of **cucumber** with 15ml of **Demerara sugar syrup** in a shaker.
2. Add 20ml of **lime juice**, 90ml of **apple juice**, and **ice**.
3. Shake.
4. Strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 60ml of **soda water**.
6. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
7. Garnish with a **cucumber** slice.

cocktails.name: Seedlip Spritz
cocktails.description: A crisp non-alcoholic spritz with citrus lift and gentle botanical notes from **Seedlip** and **tonic**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Seedlip** and 10ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Top with 120ml of **tonic**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Cucumber Basil Cooler
cocktails.description: A garden-fresh alcohol-free cooler built on **cucumber**, **basil**, and bright **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 4 slices of **cucumber** and 6 leaves of **basil** to a shaker and muddle gently.
2. Add 20ml of **lime juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a Collins glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 120ml of **soda water** and stir gently.

cocktails.name: Ginger Peach Fizz
cocktails.description: A juicy non-alcoholic fizz combining ripe **peach** puree with zesty **lemon juice** and **ginger ale**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a highball glass, muddle half a **peach** with 15ml of **lemon juice**.
2. Fill the glass with **ice**.
3. Add 120ml of **ginger ale**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with 2 **peach** slices.

cocktails.name: Berry Kombucha Smash
cocktails.description: A vibrant non-alcoholic smash with muddled berries, **lime juice**, and sparkling **kombucha**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 4 **blackberry** and 2 **strawberry** with 10ml of **honey syrup** in a shaker.
2. Add 15ml of **lime juice** and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Top with 120ml of **kombucha**.

cocktails.name: Lavender Lemon Fizz
cocktails.description: A fragrant alcohol-free fizz with floral **lavender syrup**, fresh **lemon juice**, and chilled soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **lavender syrup** and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Top with 90ml of **soda water**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** wheel.

cocktails.name: Pineapple Coconut Cooler
cocktails.description: A creamy tropical mocktail blending **pineapple juice**, **coconut milk**, and fresh **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **pineapple juice**, 45ml of **coconut milk**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge.

cocktails.name: Orange Rosemary Tonic
cocktails.description: A bright non-alcoholic highball of **orange juice**, **tonic**, and aromatic **rosemary**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **orange juice** and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Top with 120ml of **tonic**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **rosemary** sprig.

cocktails.name: Watermelon Mint Sparkler
cocktails.description: A refreshing sparkling mocktail with juicy **watermelon juice**, cool **mint**, and zesty **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 6 **mint** leaves and 15ml of **lime juice** to a glass and gently muddle.
2. Fill with **ice** and add 90ml of **watermelon juice**.
3. Top with 90ml of **soda water**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Apple Ginger Mule
cocktails.description: A crisp alcohol-free mule-style serve with **apple juice**, **ginger beer**, and fresh **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a copper mug with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **apple juice** and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Top with 90ml of **ginger beer**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with 4 **berries** and a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Cranberry Sage Spritz
cocktails.description: A tart and herbaceous non-alcoholic spritz of **cranberry juice**, **hibiscus syrup**, and **sage**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Gently press **sage** leaves in a shaker.
2. Add 70ml of **cranberry juice**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 10ml of **hibiscus syrup**, and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a wine glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 90ml of **soda water** and garnish with a **sage** leaf.

cocktails.name: Safe Sex on the Beach
cocktails.description: A fruity zero-proof beach-style cooler with **orange juice**, **cranberry juice**, **peach**, and a touch of **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a shaker, muddle a half of a **peach** with 15ml of **grenadine**.
2. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 60ml of **orange juice** and 60ml of **cranberry juice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a Collins glass with fresh **ice**.
6. Garnish with an **orange** wedge and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Faux 75
cocktails.description: A sparkling alcohol-free serve inspired by the French 75, built with a non-alcoholic spirit, **lemon juice**, **simple syrup**, and **soda water**. **Seedlip** is one suitable option for the spirit component.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of a non-alcoholic spirit (for example, **Seedlip**), 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled flute.
5. Top with 75ml of **soda water**.
6. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Berry Smash Fizz
cocktails.description: A bright berry-forward mocktail with muddled **raspberry**, **blueberry**, **lemon juice**, and **soda water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 6 **raspberry**, 6 **blueberry**, and 15ml of **simple syrup** to a shaker and muddle.
2. Add 20ml of **lemon juice** and 130g of **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Top with 120ml of **soda water**.

cocktails.name: Passion Fruit Fizz
cocktails.description: A tropical non-alcoholic fizz with tangy **passion fruit juice**, fresh **lime juice**, and sparkling **soda water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **passion fruit juice**, 20ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 90ml of **soda water**.
6. Garnish with **passion fruit** and **mint**.

cocktails.name: Ginger Lemon Spritz
cocktails.description: A zesty alcohol-free spritz combining spicy **ginger ale**, fresh **lemon juice**, and a touch of **honey syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **lemon juice** and 20ml of **honey syrup**.
3. Top with 80ml of **ginger ale**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** wheel.

cocktails.name: Hibiscus Cooler
cocktails.description: A ruby-red non-alcoholic cooler with floral **hibiscus syrup**, bright **lime juice**, and crisp **soda water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **hibiscus syrup** and 25ml of **lime juice**.
3. Top with 100ml of **soda water**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Espresso Tonic Zero
cocktails.description: A crisp zero-proof highball layering chilled **espresso** over bubbly **tonic** with a bright **orange** twist.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 120ml of **tonic** and 5ml of **simple syrup** (optional).
3. Gently pour 30ml of chilled **espresso** over the top to create a layered look.
4. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Tropical Kombucha Spritz
cocktails.description: A light tropical spritz with tangy **kombucha**, juicy **pineapple juice**, and fresh **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a wine glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **pineapple juice** and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Top with 120ml of **kombucha**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktails.name: Watermelon Sage Cooler
cocktails.description: A summer-style non-alcoholic cooler with fresh **watermelon juice**, aromatic **sage**, and lively **soda water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Gently press **sage** leaves in a shaker.
2. Add 90ml of **watermelon juice**, 20ml of **lime juice**, 10ml of **simple syrup**, and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 60ml of **soda water** and stir gently.
6. Garnish with a **sage** leaf.

cocktails.name: Cherry Bomb #2
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward tequila riff with layered cherry and bitter-chocolate accents balanced by **Acqua Bianca** liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 5ml of **Amaro**, 5ml of **Acqua Bianca**, 5ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 5ml of **cherry brandy**, and 2 dashes of **chocolate bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a **cherry** and an **olive**.

cocktails.name: Ciao Bella
cocktails.description: A silky after-dinner sipper combining **Acqua Bianca** and **white crème de cacao**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Acqua Bianca** and 30ml of **Crème de Cacao white**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a **mint** leaf.

cocktails.name: White Water Ride
cocktails.description: A bright, tropical highball-style serve of white rum, **Acqua Bianca** and **coconut water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **Acqua Bianca**, 10ml of **overproof rum**, and 60ml of **coconut water**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.
5. Express the oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: White Spider
cocktails.description: A clean, spirituous duo of **vodka** and **Acqua Bianca**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka** and 22.5ml of **Acqua Bianca**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a green **olive**.

cocktails.name: White Sting
cocktails.description: A brandy-led short cocktail softened by **Acqua Bianca**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac** and 22.5ml of **Acqua Bianca**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **mint** leaf.

cocktails.name: White Grasshopper
cocktails.description: A creamy dessert-style variation on the **Grasshopper** with **Acqua Bianca** and **white crème de cacao**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Acqua Bianca**, 30ml of **Crème de Cacao white**, and 30ml of **heavy cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.
5. Garnish with grated white **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Salvamento
cocktails.description: A balanced, aromatic sour-leaning trio of **Calvados**, **amaro** and **Acqua Bianca**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **calvados**, 20ml of **Amaro**, and 15ml of **Acqua Bianca**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: White Water Sour
cocktails.description: A velvety sour built on **Acqua Bianca** with bright lemon and silky egg white texture.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Acqua Bianca**, 20ml of **lemon juice**, and an **egg white**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

ingredients.name: 7-Up
ingredients.description: Lemon-lime carbonated soft drink. Sweet citrus profile with bright acidity and light bubbles. Typical ABV: 0%. Used to lengthen drinks and add sweetness and fizz in highballs like **Whiskey Highball** variations or **vodka 7-Up**.

ingredients.name: Absinthe
ingredients.description: Absinthe is an anise-forward spirit distilled with wormwood and other botanicals, typically 45–74% ABV. It is traditionally diluted with water to unlock its louche haze. Nicknamed the green fairy and linked to 19th-Century artists.

ingredients.name: Absolut Citron
ingredients.description: Citrus-flavoured **vodka** from Absolut in Åhus, Sweden, about 40% ABV. A bright lemon character elevates **Cosmopolitans** and other citrus cocktails.

ingredients.name: Absolut Vodka
ingredients.description: Swedish winter wheat **vodka** from Åhus with about 40% ABV. Known for a clean, neutral profile and consistent quality. Popular base for countless cocktails worldwide.

ingredients.name: Acqua Bianca
ingredients.description: Acqua Bianca liqueur is a clear, vanilla-citrus egg liqueur style spirit with creamy sweetness and around 20% ABV.

ingredients.name: Agave Syrup
ingredients.description: Agave syrup is a honey-like sweetener made from blue agave and related plants. It has a mellow caramel sweetness and dissolves quickly in cold drinks. Common in **Margaritas** and other **Tequila** cocktails.

ingredients.name: Aged Rum
ingredients.description: Rum aged in oak for deeper caramel and spice notes, typically around 40% ABV. Made from molasses or sugarcane juice. Smooth sipper that also suits **Old Fashioned**-style drinks.

ingredients.name: Ale
ingredients.description: Ale is a malty, fruity beer around 4–6% ABV. Enjoy it in a Shandy or Snakebite.

ingredients.name: Allspice
ingredients.description: Warm spice with clove, cinnamon, and nutmeg notes often used in **Tiki** syrups and punches.

ingredients.name: Allspice Dram
ingredients.description: Allspice-flavoured liqueur around 22% ABV, is used in **Tiki** cocktails.

ingredients.name: Almond (Orgeat) Syrup
ingredients.description:
Almond syrup, aka *orgeat*, is a sweet, nutty syrup made from **almonds**, **sugar**, and **orange flower water**. It adds a creamy, aromatic quality to tropical and **Tiki** cocktails.
Instructions:
1. **Toast & grind:** preheat oven to 200°c. Toast **almonds** for 3–4 minutes until fragrant. Let cool, then pulse in a food processor until coarsely ground.
2. **Make syrup:** combine **sugar** and **water** in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir until dissolved, bring to a boil for 3 minutes, then add the ground almonds.
3. **Steep:** lower the heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat, cover, and let infuse for 3 to 12 hours at room temperature.
4. **Strain:** pour through several layers of cheesecloth or a nut milk bag, squeezing hard to extract all almond oils and liquid.
5. **Finish:** stir in **orange flower water**. Transfer to a clean bottle.

ingredients.name: Amaretto
ingredients.description: Amaretto is an Italian almond liqueur at 21–28% ABV with a sweet, nutty flavour. Use it in **Godfather**.

ingredients.name: Amaro
ingredients.description: Amaro is a bitter-sweet Italian herbal liqueur produced by infusing alcohol with a blend of botanicals, including herbs, roots, spices, and citrus peels, then sweetening it and aging the mixture.

ingredients.name: Amaro Montenegro
ingredients.description: Amaro Montenegro is a herbal Italian amaro from Bologna, 23% ABV. Mix it in a **Monte & Tonic** or **Paper Plane**.

ingredients.name: Amaro Nonino
ingredients.description: Amaro Nonino is a bittersweet amaro from Nonino Distillatori at 35% ABV. Ideal in a **Paper Plane** or **Black Manhattan**.

ingredients.name: Amontillado Sherry
ingredients.description: Nutty, amber sherry that begins as Fino before aging oxidatively, around 16–18% ABV. Dry with savory, toasted notes. Adds depth to cobblers and stirred cocktails.

ingredients.name: Angelica root
ingredients.description: Earthy, herbal root that adds dry bitterness to gins and aromatic bitters.

ingredients.name: Angostura Bitters
ingredients.description: Concentrated Trinidad bitters at 44.7% ABV made with gentian, herbs, and spices. Famous oversized label and closely guarded recipe. A few dashes add spice and bitterness to classics like the **Old Fashioned** or **Manhattan**.

ingredients.name: Aniseed Liqueur
ingredients.description: Aniseed is a sweet anise-flavoured liqueur, typically 20–40% ABV. Try it in a **Greta Garbo** or **Northern Light**.

ingredients.name: Anise
ingredients.description: Licorice-scented spice that brightens syrups, liqueurs, and garnishes.

ingredients.name: Anisette
ingredients.description: Sweet anise-flavored liqueur around 25% ABV. Clear and aromatic with licorice character. Served chilled, with coffee, or in pastis-style mixes.

ingredients.name: Aperol
ingredients.description: Aperol is a bright orange aperitif from the Campari group, 11% ABV, with bitter citrus and rhubarb notes. Perfect for an **Aperol Spritz** or **Paper Plane**.

ingredients.name: Apple
ingredients.description: Crisp, sweet-tart fruit used for juices, garnishes, and infusions. Adds fresh orchard aroma to cocktails.

ingredients.name: Apple Brandy
ingredients.description: Fruit brandy distilled from apples, typically 40–50% ABV. Offers baked-apple and spice notes from barrel ageing. Great in **Jack Rose**-style cocktails.

ingredients.name: Apple Cider
ingredients.description: Apple cider is a crisp fermented apple drink at 4–6% ABV. Enjoy it in a **Snakebite** or **Stone Fence**.

ingredients.name: Apple Juice
ingredients.description: Sweet pressed apple juice with crisp acidity. Adds gentle fruitiness to punches and highballs. Works with rum, bourbon, and cider-inspired cocktails.

ingredients.name: Apple Liqueur
ingredients.description: Apple liqueur is a sweet apple spirit around 15–30% ABV. Shake it into **Appletini** or **apple Jack** cocktails.

ingredients.name: Apple Schnapps
ingredients.description: Apple schnapps is a tart apple spirit with roughly 15–25% ABV. Use it in an **apple Pie shot** or **Appletini** cocktail.

ingredients.name: Applejack
ingredients.description: American apple spirit is often blended with neutral grain, usually 40–50% ABV. Brings baked-apple flavour with subtle oak. Classic choice for **Jack Rose** and **Old Fashioned** riffs.

ingredients.name: Apricot Brandy
ingredients.description: Apricot-based brandy or liqueur with stone-fruit sweetness, usually 30–40% ABV. Adds jammy orchard notes to cocktails. Useful in sours and Tiki drinks.

ingredients.name: Apricot Nectar
ingredients.description: Sweet, thick apricot juice blend that brings mellow stone-fruit flavour. Great for Tiki drinks, spritzes, and punches.

ingredients.name: Ardbeg
ingredients.description: Islay single malt scotch is famed for intense peat smoke and maritime notes, typically around 46% ABV. Distilled on Islay’s south coast. Bold choice for **Penicillin** variations or neat sipping.

ingredients.name: Bacardi 151 Proof Rum
ingredients.description: Very high-proof rum at 75½% ABV once made by bacardi. Powerful caramel and molasses notes suited to punches or flaming drinks. Handle carefully and dilute in cocktails.

ingredients.name: Baileys
ingredients.description: Baileys Irish cream is a creamy liqueur by Diageo, 17% ABV, with chocolate and whiskey notes. Serve in a **Mudslide** or **B-52**.

ingredients.name: Banana
ingredients.description: Soft, sweet fruit with creamy texture used for smoothies and tiki garnishes. Works well in frozen cocktails or batched punches.

ingredients.name: Banana Liqueur
ingredients.description: Banana liqueur is a sweet banana spirit about 20–25% ABV. Mix it in a **Banana Daiquiri** or **Dirty Banana**.

ingredients.name: Banana Liqueur Green
ingredients.description: Vivid green banana liqueur with sweet tropical aroma around 20–25% ABV. Adds colour and ripe banana notes to Tiki drinks and dessert cocktails.

ingredients.name: Basil
ingredients.description: Basil is a fragrant herb with a sweet, slightly peppery flavor. It adds a fresh and aromatic note to both alcoholic and non-alcoholic cocktails. Common in summer drinks, it pairs especially well with **gin**, **vodka**, and citrus juices.

ingredients.name: Becherovka
ingredients.description: Becherovka is a traditional, 100% natural czech herbal liqueur, made with a secret recipe of over 20 herbs and spices and an alcohol by volume (ABV) of 38%. It is often enjoyed as a digestif.

ingredients.name: Beef Bouillon
ingredients.description: Beef bouillon is a savoury broth made by simmering beef with vegetables and seasonings. In cocktails, it is primarily used in savoury drinks like the **Bloody Bull**, adding depth and umami richness.

ingredients.name: Beer
ingredients.description: Beer is a carbonated malt beverage around 4–6% ABV with malty, hoppy notes. Pour it into a **Michelada** or **Shandy**.

ingredients.name: Benedictine
ingredients.description: French herbal liqueur around 40% ABV with honeyed sweetness and spice. Created by Alexandre le Grand from a secret blend of botanicals. Essential in drinks like the **Vieux Carré** and **Singapore Sling**.

ingredients.name: Berentzen Apfelkorn
ingredients.description: Berentzen Apfelkorn is a German apple schnapps by Berentzen Group, 18% ABV. Enjoy it in an **apple Shot** or **apple Strudel** cocktail.

ingredients.name: Berries
ingredients.description: Mixed berries that deliver bright acidity and deep colour. Perfect for dousing into **Spritzes** and **Sangria**.

ingredients.name: Bianco Vermouth
ingredients.description: Vermouth is an aromatised fortified wine around 15–18% ABV. Use it in a **Martini** or **Negroni**.

ingredients.name: Bittermens Boston Bittahs
ingredients.description: Citrus-forward bitters with grapefruit and hop notes. Brightens gin, rum, or **Tequila** cocktails with gentle bitterness. Use a dash or two to add sparkle without heavy spice.

ingredients.name: Bitters
ingredients.description: Aromatic bitters are alcohol-based flavour concentrates infused with herbs and spices. Just a few dashes add bitterness, spice, and balance to cocktails. Keep them on the rail for **Old Fashioneds**, **Manhattans**, and sours.

ingredients.name: Bison Grass Vodka
